instructions: Rifts is a complicated game, and this is a complicated sheet. Please expand and review the instructions on the Options tab of the sheet in order to use it to its fullest. Happy gaming!

useroptions.displayname: Apply Rifts: Ultimate Edition penalties to dodging gunfire
useroptions.description: In Rifts: Ultimate Edition, characters are -10 to dodge gunfire at less than 10 feet, and -5 between 10 and 50 feet.

useroptions.displayname: Add PP bonus to Disarm and Entangle
useroptions.description: Add bonus from PP attribute to Disarm and Entangle, in addition to Strike/Parry/Dodge.
Rifter #13, p.16 describes a Perception bonus based on IQ. Checking this will factor in that bonus.

useroptions.displayname: Apply PS damage to each hand in Paired attack
useroptions.description: If attacking using paired weapons, checking this will apply any PS bonus/Punch damage as applicable to each weapon in a Paired Weapons attack. Otherwise the PS damage is applied once to the total of both hands. If unchecked, this will also divide the PS damage by 2 when using Paired Weapons but only striking with one weapon.

useroptions.displayname: Apply Hand to Hand critical (19-20, 18-20) to modern weapons as well
useroptions.description: If a character has a critical on 19-20 or 18-20 from their Hand to Hand skill, apply this to modern weapons as well.

useroptions.displayname: Apply IQ bonus to skill-based abilities
useroptions.description: Adds IQ bonus to abilities/magic/psionic that use a skill-based percentage. Some examples include, but are not limited to, Telemechanics, Object Read, Locate, etc.

All sheet rolls are sent to all players in chat by default. Query Whisper option gives you a prompt with each roll of whether or not the roll should be sent privately only to yourself and the GM. Always Whisper Rolls will send all rolls only to yourself and the GM.
